steps.name: minNumPlayersPostCryogenicSlumberParty
steps.summary: Have two or more players in an online party.

steps.name: turnOnPower
steps.summary: Turn on the power

notes: The power switch is located near to the power room

steps.name: waveGun
steps.summary: Obtain the Wave Gun.
notes: Required for several steps, particularly for moving the Vril Sphere.

steps.name: hacker
steps.summary: Obtain the Hacker device.
notes: Used for hacking terminals and panels in the Laboratory.

steps.name: quantumEntanglementDevice
steps.summary: Obtain the Quantum Entanglement Device.
notes: Needed for specific steps following the Cryogenic Slumber Party achievement.

steps.name: gershDevice
steps.summary: Obtain the Gersh Device.
notes: Required for moving certain objects and completing steps post-Cryogenic Slumber Party.

steps.name: simonSays
steps.summary: Complete the Simon Says game outside the Receiving Bay.
notes: Involves pressing computers in sequence according to their flashing colors.

steps.name: hackingLaboratory
steps.summary: Hack terminals and panels in the Laboratory.
notes: Find and hack four white panel boxes with bright green lights within a time limit.

steps.name: revealPlates
steps.summary: Throw a grenade at this spot in Area 51 to reveal Casimir Plates

steps.name: getPlates
steps.summary: Teleport Casimir Plates to Moon's Spawn Room

steps.name: movePlates
steps.summary: Move Casimir Plates to right side of the room by throwing QED

steps.name: getWire
steps.summary: Get Curved Lead Wire

steps.name: buildComputer
steps.summary: Build the computer on the spawn room to charge the vril device

steps.name: chargeVrilDevice
steps.summary: Charge the Vril device

steps.name: placeVrilDevice
steps.summary: Take the charged Vril Device and place it in the pyramid

steps.name: switchSouls
steps.summary: Switch Souls between Samantha and Richtofen

steps.name: letExcavatorBreachTunnel6
steps.summary: Let excavator Pi breach Tunnel 6 to reveal Vril Sphere.
notes: A necessary step to move the Vril Sphere.

steps.name: moveVrilSphereToPyramid
steps.summary: Move the Vril Sphere to the pyramid using the Wave Gun.
notes: Knifing or shooting the Vril Sphere makes it move; use the Wave Gun for specific parts.

steps.name: fillContainerWithZombieSouls
steps.summary: Kill zombies near the cylindrical glass container to fill it with souls.
notes: 25 zombie souls are required to fill the container.

steps.name: openMPD
steps.summary: Open the Moon Pyramid Device.

steps.name: simonSaysThrice
steps.summary: Complete the Simon Says game again thrice.

steps.name: throwQEDAtVrilSphere
steps.summary: Retrieve the Vril Sphere by throwing a QED on it

steps.name: throwGerschAtVrilSphere
steps.summary: Throw a Gersch device at the Vril Sphere

steps.name: finale
steps.summary: Launch the rockets
